item.title: A Tale of One More City
item.description: Bit’o’code to turn nested list into data frame. yelp_df_all <- lapply(all_businesses_list, unlist) %>% lapply(., as.list) %>% lapply(., as.data.frame, stringsAsFactors = F) %>% bind_rows() ## Observations: 11,153 ## Variables: 31 ## $ id <chr> "OCPzx3gU8JkiJ1laTcpy7g", "J8uT9qybm... ## $ alias <chr> "strandbad-werder-mario-müller-werde... ## $ name <chr> "Strandbad Werder Mario Müller", "La... ## $ image_url <chr> "", "https://s3-media3.fl.yelpcdn.co... ## $ is_closed <chr> "FALSE", "FALSE", "FALSE", "FALSE", ... ## $ url <chr> "https://www.yelp.com/biz/strandbad-... ## $ review_count <dbl> 1, 1, 6, 11, 21, 3, 3, 1, 8, 11, 4, .
